HERO_SUBTITLE: We are founded by a leading academic and researcher in the field of Industrial Systems Engineering.
STORY_SUBTITLE: Our vision was born from the belief that a single piece of paper cannot be trusted with our vaccination records in today’s world. We believe, travelling, moving or living abroad must be easier and safer.
WHO_WE_ARE_SUBTITLE_1: Our goal is to digitally store vaccination and immunization records safely and make it available at the fingertips of the users, using blockchain technology to give people control of their data.
WHO_WE_ARE_SUBTITLE_2: Immunie is committed to have people’s best interest at heart, to be fully transparent, and to respect and promote diversity and different cultures. We believe in teamwork and will always work to offer the best solutions for our customers and partners.
TEAM_SUBTITLE: After 3 days all of your offers will arrive and you will have another 7 days to select your new company.
PARTNERS_SUBTITLE: We are registered as a distributor with AMFI, as an investment advisor with SEBI and platform partners with BSE.
GALLERY_SUBTITLE: After 3 days all of your offers will arrive and you will have another 7 days to select your new company.
